E000-0000:
Fixing temperature control startup error
 Temperature of the Fixing Assembly did not reach the specified temperature within the specified period of time.
1. Check connectors on the fixing film unit. 2. Replace the fixing film unit. 3. Replace the engine controller PCB.

Abnormal high temperature of Fixing Assembly
 Temperature of the Thermistor continuously exceeded a certain value.
1. Check connectors on the fixing film unit. 2. Replace the fixing film unit. 3. Replace the engine controller PCB.

Abnormal low temperature of Fixing Assembly
 Fixing temperature was lower than the target value at printing/cleaning mode.
1. Check connectors on the fixing film unit. 2. Replace the fixing film unit. 3. Replace the engine controller PCB.

Fixing Heater drive circuit error
 Abnormal frequency was detected in fixing drive circuit within the specified period of time from power-on.
1. Check connectors on the fixing film unit. 2. Replace the fixing film unit. 3. Replace the engine controller PCB.

Laser area failure
 Scanner Motor control error Scanner Motor startup error BDI signal error
1. Check connectors on the scanner unit. 2. Replace the scanner unit. 3. Replace the engine controller PCB.

Error in Engine controller
 A data communication error occurred in the Engine Controller PCB.
Replace the Engine Controller PCB.

Error in main controller communication
 Access to the Flash ROM in the Main Controller failed.
Replace the Engine Controller PCB.

Printer communication error
 Communication error between the Engine Controller PCB and the Main Controller PCB occurred.
1. Turn OFF and then ON the main power. 2. Replace the Main Controller PCB. 3. Replace the Engine Controller PCB.?

Printer communication error
 Communication error between the Engine Controller PCB and the Main Controller PCB occurred.?
1. Turn OFF and then ON the main power. 2. Replace the Main Controller PCB. 3. Replace the Engine Controller PCB.

Printer communication error
 Communication error between the Engine Controller PCB and the Main Controller PCB occurred.
1. Turn OFF and then ON the main power. 2. Replace the Main Controller PCB. 3. Replace the Engine Controller PCB.

Printer communication error
 Communication error between the Engine Controller PCB and the Main Controller PCB occurred.
1. Turn OFF and then ON the main power. 2. Replace the Main Controller PCB. 3. Replace the Engine Controller PCB.

Printer communication error
 Communication error between the Engine Controller PCB and the Main Controller PCB occurred.
1. Turn OFF and then ON the main power. 2. Replace the Main Controller PCB. 3. Replace the Engine Controller PCB.

Printer communication error
 ?Communication error between the Engine Controller PCB and the Main Controller PCB occurred.
1. Turn OFF and then ON the main power. 2. Replace the Main Controller PCB. 3. Replace the Engine Controller PCB.

Error in main controller communication
 An error in reading of/writing to the Flash ROM in the Main Controller occurred.
1. Turn OFF and then ON the main power. 2. Replace the Main Controller PCB.

Engine ID error
 Invalid engine connection was detected.
1. Turn OFF and then ON the main power. 2. Check if the installed Engine Controller PCB is for this model. 3. Replace the Engine Controller PCB.

Communication error with the Wireless LAN PCB
 Unable to communicate with the Wireless LAN.
1. Turn OFF and then ON the main power. 2. Check the connection of the Wireless LAN. 3. Replace the Wireless LAN PCB. 4. Replace the Main Controller PCB.
